accounts.name: vrf_program_identity
docs: This check ensure that the vrf_program_identity (which is a PDA) is a singer
enforcing the callback is executed by the VRF program through CPI

accounts.name: authority
docs: CHECK : The authority for the program

errors.name: InvalidWarriorState
errors.msg: Warrior is not in the correct state for this action

errors.name: NotWarriorOwner
errors.msg: Only the warrior owner can perform this action

errors.name: WarriorAlreadyInBattle
errors.msg: Warrior is already in a battle

errors.name: InvalidBattleState
errors.msg: Battle room is not in the correct state for this action

errors.name: BattleRoomFull
errors.msg: Battle room already has two players

errors.name: NotBattleParticipant
errors.msg: Only battle participants can perform this action

errors.name: PlayerNotReady
errors.msg: Player has not marked themselves as ready

errors.name: BattleAlreadySettled
errors.msg: Battle results have already been settled

errors.name: InvalidRoomId
errors.msg: Room ID is invalid or too long

errors.name: VrfRequestNotFound
errors.msg: VRF request not found or expired

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: Not authorized to perform this action

errors.name: GameNotInitialized
errors.msg: Game state has not been initialized

errors.name: AlreadyAnswered
errors.msg: Player has already answered this question

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Name is too long, consider reducing it

errors.name: OnlyCreatorCanCancel
errors.msg: Only the room creator can cancel the battle

errors.name: BattleAlreadyStarted
errors.msg: Battle has already started and cannot be cancelled

errors.name: BattleAlreadyCancelled
errors.msg: Battle room has already been cancelled

errors.name: CannotCancelAtThisStage
errors.msg: Cannot cancel battle at this stage

errors.name: InvalidImageIndex
errors.msg: Invalid image index for the selected rarity

errors.name: InvalidClassRarity
errors.msg: Invalid warrior class and rarity combination
